section.title: Print Item Labels by Class Code
section.para: To print item labels by class code, select the Print Item Labels by Class Code option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Print Item Labels by Class Code

section.para: When printing item labels by class code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to print item labels for all class codes.
Specify class code you want to print item labels for.
Enter a class code pattern to select a range of class codes. Refine your search using regular expressions.
Select to print item labels for all sites.
Specify site you want to print item labels for.
Specify the report you want to use for printing item labels. Menu will list available label form definitions.
